metadata.title: Gifts for Him, Cool Men's Stainless Steel Biker Tribal Wolf Head Pendant Necklace, Blue CZ, 24" Chain
features: PUNK ROCK STYLE- Cool designed with solid stainless steel heavy Wolf Head Pendant adding a touch of gothic to your look, perfect adornment for a manly man.
Made of quality stainless steel, Solid and durable
EYE-CATCHING- Silver chain, gothic biker wolf head pendant, Attractive and eye-catching, lets you become the focus of people.

GREAT GIFT IDEA- Comes in a little black velvet bag, and these trendy design necklace are always loved by men in fashion. Best choice for birthday, anniversary, holidays, stocking stuffers, graduation, Christmas, Valentine's Day, Father's Day Halloween and any other occasions.
description: Wolves are symbols of nobility and loyalty, making this stainless steel pendant necklace a perfect gift for a friend or family member. Our newest stainless steel wolf head pendant necklace perfectly captures the spirit of the wolf. Beloved by many and prominently featured in art, jewelry and literature of many cultures worldwide, our wolf necklace will easily help you express your individual style. Accessorize like you mean it and celebrate the unique you with this purchase.
Blowin Fathers Day Gifts Cool Men's Stainless Steel Biker Tribal Wolf Head Pendant Necklace, Blue CZ, 24" Chain, Free Gift Bag
